projects.title: DyslexoFly
projects.description: AI-powered accessible learning platform with summarization and TTS. Built using Flask backend and Next.js frontend with TensorFlow models for text processing.

projects.title: CaptureSmart
projects.description: Real-time camera enhancement application with TensorFlow and Android SDK. Implemented computer vision algorithms for image quality improvement.
projects.impact: Achieved 40% improvement in image quality metrics

projects.title: Deepfake Detection
projects.description: Vision transformer based detection pipeline for identifying manipulated media. Achieved 94% accuracy on benchmark datasets.
